attributes.review: i open the app to find on my screen the face of a man who can’t tan for his life!!!! i read into his information because you can judge to quickly, only to find the worst political views possible, that makes one sick to their core. it’s absolutely terrible and weird that even my pet fish threw up as well as my pet rock was disgusted.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app I’ve ever downloaded. First of all it takes up more than 50gb once the app has to update. Second, it gave my phone a virus, a lying fat orange chicken keeps popping up on my screen saying he’s my president. And worst of all, people actually believe that he’s their president. I mean the chicken is barely literate. Shame 🤦🏾‍♀️
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE! worst app i’ve ever seen, it keeps kicking me out and lagging every time i go on the app. it took multiple weeks to download and the app isn’t even all that. plus what’s the point of an app that supports a racist president who has also said multiple things glorifying sexual assault 🤦🏽‍♀️ the worst president ever! 👎🏽 plus the app is as garbage as him🤢
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 👎🏽🤦🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: I downloaded this to stay in touch with the Trump campaign but noticed that my phone started lagging, even when the app wasn’t open. I’ve since heard that downloading the app can give access to personal information. Even if that’s not true, the app is not worth it.
attributes.title: Made my phone glitch

attributes.review: worst app EVER!!!! why would anyone download this?!?!? right after i downloaded the app my dog died from a heart attack, then my house went up in flames, right after my family and i got out my dad got ran over by a car and died on the spot, my mom was diagnosed with cancer and just recently died and right now i’m homeless and starving
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: Upon getting this app it was horrible from the start! It played loud music that scared me to practical death! It took two weeks to even finish downloading and it was over all just the worst app ever. It also had bright flashing lights, like it was trying to kill me! 10/10 DON’T RECOMMEND!!!
attributes.title: Horrible Quality, Loud Sounds, Flashing Lights

attributes.review: Right when I opened this app, my vajayjay felt horrible ✨🧚🏾💞, roaches crawled all through out my room and ate my dog. My phone went black for 2 hours and I couldn’t get back on it, my mom started talking gibberish. My walls started  shrinking as well and my floor turned into mashed potatoes with gravy🌿💫🧚🏾🧚🏾💗, I don’t recommend. Also BLACK LIVES MATTER ✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: Just horrible

attributes.review: I used to be a trump supporter until this day... I was scrolling through Facebook and came upon this application, obviously I had to download but when I downloaded it... it was really inappropriate for sensitive users. So now I have realized how wrong our president is, I will no longer be supporting this menace. #weirdo #trumpnogood #kanyewest2020.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: I just wanted to support, but when I opened the app a loud ringing came from my phone and my dog started attacking my phone. I had to shut my phone off and then go back on the app, but it happened again. Is this a joke? This app made my dog upset and now I’m upset. Horrible, despicable app. Don’t use the app if you have pets.😡
attributes.title: Unbelievable ✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I saw Chito on the front but when I opened it I saw an orange wearing it to pay disgusting I really thought this app was just gonna be a picture of a bunch of oranges but now is a rapist putting children in cages 10 out of 10 would not recommend awful disgusting projectile vomit when I open this app
attributes.title: eww
